1248070.name: Kingdom Under Fire: The Crusaders  Soundtrack
1248070.description:
Blueside is pleased to present the official soundtrack of Kingdom Under Fire: The Crusaders to all owners of the 2004 cult action-strategy hybrid.




Enjoy the drum pounding, guitar-shredding, heavy metal filled soundtrack of this beloved classic with 26 original tracks from the game. You have waited 16 years for this, wait no longer, FOR BERSIA!



The official soundtrack is free to download for all.
